title: critique, www-site
content:
This is a www-site (front page) I am designing for my friend who has a small printing house where he prints flags, badges, stickers, etc. Please share your thoughts.

Full size at: [http://i46.tinypic.com/15zf3wn.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416185200/http:/i46.tinypic.com/15zf3wn.jpg "http://i46.tinypic.com/15zf3wn.jpg")
